definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to lend on interest/to borrow/a loan/leniency/to make excuses/to pardon/to forgive

sentences.english: Field day in said that so calculate you borrow a down, after his owing on the loan.
sentences.chinese: 田天在又说那这样吧算你借个首付，以后自己还贷。

sentences.english: Since spent catalyst is also returnable for a credit.
sentences.chinese: 因为废催化剂也可退回进行还贷？

sentences.english: Repayment guaranteed to tay the ame throughout the length of the loan.
sentences.chinese: 偿还的贷款保证在江浙地区还贷期间保持不变。

sentences.english: Ability to be ahead of schedule owing on the loan, there is room for the hands of residents.
sentences.chinese: 提前还贷应量力而为，适合手中有闲钱的居民。

sentences.english: They say rich countries get richer, while poor countries struggle to repay.
sentences.chinese: 这样，富国愈富，而穷国为还贷不断挣扎。

sentences.english: The elimination of inflation would ensure that the amountof money used in repaying a loan would have the same value as theamount of money borrowed.
sentences.chinese: 消除通货膨胀应确保还贷的钱应与所贷款的价值相同。

sentences.english: Let's explore the pros and cons of this type of debt solution.
sentences.chinese: 让我们来看看这种还贷方式的利与弊吧。
